programme.title: muusikavideod ETV2
programme.sub-title: Me juttudest läbi. Mairo Libba, Katri Kade ja Külliki Lauluaed

programme.title: Lohe Zog ja lendavad tohtrid
Zog and the Flying Doctors
programme.desc: Lohe Zog, printsess Pärl ja söör Gustav tõusevad lendu! Lendavad tohtrid jõuavad nii aevastava lõvi kui ka päikesepõletuse saanud merineitsi juurde, kuid printsess Pärli teod ei ole tema kuningast onu jaoks vastuvõetavad, sest printsessid peaksid ju patjadel puhkama. Kui aga salapärane haigus kuninga enda maha murrab, peab printsess Pärl ka teda ravima.(n)

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Petter kutsub Martini nimel Delia kinno. Kenasti ja isegi romantiliselt alanud kinoskäigust kujuneb täielik katastroof.(n)

programme.title: Suur Sõbralik Hiiglane
The BFG
programme.desc: Režissöör Steven Spielbergi kauaoodatud filmiversioon Roald Dahli raamatust „Suur Sõbralik Hiiglane“ räägib fantastilise loo noorest tüdrukust ja hiiglasest, kes tutvustab talle Hiiglastemaa imesid ning ohtusid. SSH (Mark Rylance) on ka ise hiiglane, kuid ta on Suur Sõbralik Hiiglane, kes erineb teistest Hiiglastemaa elanikest nagu öö ja päev. Seitse meetrit pikk, tohutu suurte kõrvade ja hea lõhnatajuga hiiglane on armsal kombel juhm ning hoiab suurema osa ajast omaette. Kuid hiiglased, nagu Verevaat (Bill Hader) ja Lihakugistaja (Jemaine Clement), on kaks korda suuremad ning vähemalt kaks korda kohutavamad ja kuulu järgi söövad nad ka inimesi. SSH aga eelistab tatikurke ja sibamulkerit. Kui Londonist pärit 10-aastane varaküps Sophie Hiiglastemaale jõuab, kardab ta esialgu salapärast hiiglast, kes ta enda koopasse viis. Üsna pea aga mõistab ta, et SSH on tegelikult päris armas ja võluv, ning kuna Sophie pole varem ühtegi hiiglast kohanud, on tal tollele palju küsimusi. Stsenaariumi autor on Melissa Mathison, kes tegi Spielbergiga viimati koostööd filmis „E. T. - sõber kaugelt“. Film on dubleeritud eesti keelde dubleerimisstuudios Industrial Productions. Helirežissöör Oleg Davidovich, helindamise produtsent Andrus Kasesalu, tõlge Jaanus Jõekallas.(n)

programme.title: Ülivõimetega kotkad
Natural World Super Powered Eagles
programme.desc: Kotkad on kõige võimsamad linnud taeva all. Nad saavad jagu suurtest saakloomadest, märkavad toitu suurelt kauguselt ja lauglevad kilomeetrite viisi, lastes soojadel õhuvooludel ennast kanda. Kuidas nad seda kõike teevad? Vastuseid otsib linnuteadlane Lloyd Buck, kes teeb oma väljaõpetatud kaljukotkaga rea katseid, uurides tema võimeid.(n)

programme.title: Valgele mäele
programme.desc: Inimene sünnib ja inimene sureb. Keegi meist ei tea, millal tuleb mineku hetk. Elu on nii habras! Kui palju me oskame selles elus rõõmu tunda ja ilu näha, sõltub juba meist endist. Sarja autor on alpinist Katrin Merisalu. Režissöör Andres Lepasar.(n)

programme.title: Rocheforti tüdrukud
Les demoiselles de Rochefort
programme.desc: “Rocheforti tüdrukud” on “Cherbourgi vihmavarjude” (1964) režissööri Jacques Demy 1967. aastal valminud lõbus ja helge muusikaline komöödia. Filmile lõi originaalmuusika Michel Legrand. Vaimukad kaunitarid Delphine ja Solange on 25-aastased kaksikud, kelle elus paistab alati päike. Nende elu on täis muusikat ja päevast päeva unistavad nad suurest armastusest. Ühel päeval saabub sadamalinnakesse rändnäitlejate trupp ja neidude elu saab täiesti uue hoo sisse. Osades Catherine Deneuve, Françoise Dorléac, Michel Piccoli, Jacques Perrin, Gene Kelly jt.(n)

programme.title: Piret Kalda. Sõprus ja armastus
programme.desc: Armastatud Linnateatri näitleja Piret Kalda andis sünnipäeva puhul intervjuu heale sõbrale Margus Taborile. Kirglikud reisikaaslased meenutasid koos meeleolukaid juhtumisi ja saame teada nii mõnegi nipi, kuhu tasub minna, kui saab jälle reisida. Režissöör Annika Koitmaa, toimetaja Karmel Killandi, juhtoperaator Tanel Velli-Vällik, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.(n)

programme.title: Ristumine peateega
programme.desc: Laura ja Roland üritavad hääletades teise linna jõuda. Kolmanda autoga jõuavad nad ristmikule, kust enam edasi ei saa. Neid lihtsalt ei võeta peale. Laura eestvedamisel hakatakse liikuma mööda kitsast metsateed, et öömaja leida. Oma väikeses metsamajakeses elab Osvald, kellel on foto maailma kauneimast naisest, neli miljardit dollarit, mille ta sai maja taga jões elavalt kuldkalakeselt ja näib, et ta ootab kedagi. Fotol olev naine on päevitunud, tal on sünnimärk ja ta kannab kaelas peenikest kuldketti. Roland ja Laura astuvad sisse ning tundub, et Osvald ongi Laurat oodanud. Ta on kindel, et rahast tulev jõud tõi temani tüdruku ajakirjakaanelt. Kuid asi ei möödu sekeldusteta. Laural on kaasas armastatud noormees, kellega Osvald ei ole arvestanud. Mees pakub Rolandile raha - miljard dollarit Laura armastuse eest. Algab mäng tegelaste mõistuse ja tunnete proovilepanekuga. Osades Andrus Vaarik, Piret Kalda, Jaan Tätte ja Emil Urbel. Lavastaja Arko Okk, stsenaristid Jaan Tätte ja Arko Okk, muusika autor Jukka Linkola. Film on kirjeldustõlkega.(n)

programme.title: Tormipoiss
Storm Boy
programme.desc: Eakas Michael hakkab ootamatult nägema nägemusi oma noorusest. Need mälupildid tuletavad talle meelde, kuidas ta poisina päästis ja kasvatas üles orvuks jäänud pelikani, kelle nimeks sai hr Percival. Nüüd on aeg rääkida see fantastiline lugu edasi oma lastelastele.(n)

programme.title: Hei, turbod
programme.desc: Täna viib turbode tee Keelatud linna Hiinas, kus neil tuleb taas rinda pista Vussi tempudega.(n)

programme.title: Tagasi Prostokvašinos
programme.desc: Käes on näärid, maas on paks lumi ja teid puhtaks lükates ehitavad sõbrad labürindi.(n)

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Petter kutsub Martini nimel Delia kinno. Kenasti ja isegi romantiliselt alanud kinoskäigust kujuneb täielik katastroof.(n)

programme.title: Pingviinipoeg Lolo seiklused
3.osa
programme.desc: Pingviinipoeg Lolo seiklused koos sõber Pepega kaunis ja ohtlikus Antarktikas - klassikaks saanud lugu sõprusest ja vaprusest. Seekord satuvad sõbrad röövpüüdjate kätte. Jaapani ja Sojuzmultfilmi meistrite koostöös 1987. aastal valminud multifilmi on Tallinnfilmile tõlkinud Valeeria Villandi, režissöör Arvo Kruusement, toimetaja Luule Žavoronok, näitlejad Ester Pajusoo, Mare Mander, Malle Pärn, Irja Aav, Jüri Krjukov, Hans Kaldoja, Rein Aren, Jaanus Orgulas, Tõnu Oja, Rein Oja, Enn Kraam jt.(n)

programme.title: Mörr
The Gruffalo
programme.desc: Lugu hiirekesest, kes läheb metsa jalutama ja pähklit otsima. Ta kohtub oma teel kolme vaenlase - rebase, öökulli ja maoga, kes kõik tahavad teda ära süüa, ning hiireke peab ellujäämise nimel kavaluse appi võtma. Ta räägib kõigile, et kohtus kohutava koletise ehk Mörriga, ja tema vaenlased jooksevad hirmunult oma teed. See annab hiirele enesekindlust - ta tunneb, et metsas pole enam midagi, mis teda kohutaks. Kuni ta kohtub oma fantaasia sünnitise, Mörriga. Armas joonisfilm on sündinud Julia Donaldsoni muinasjutu ja Axel Scheffleri joonistuste ainetel, mis kandideeris ka Oscarile ja BAFTAle.(n)

programme.title: Ei-Ei
programme.desc: Ei-Eil on alati palju küsimusi. Magaiver ja teised üritavad neile kõigile vastata, aga igaühel on asjadele oma seletus ja nii tuleb küsimusi aina juurde ja juurde.(n)

programme.title: Lahutus Läti moodi
programme.desc: Jogita ütleb Aivarsile, et rääkis mehele lapsega seotud saladusest. Laura läheb naabrimeest paluma, et too käituks mõistlikult. Haraldsi kodus filmitud kaadrid jõuavad kogemata internetis laia avalikkuse ette. Nõustaja annab ülesandeks minna tagasi kohta, kus esimest korda kohtuti.(n)

programme.title: Oravalood
Going Nuts – Tales from the Squirrel World
programme.desc: Oravad on meie planeedi üks edukamaid liike. Võime neid kohata linnades, mägedes, kõrbetes, vihmametsades ja isegi Arktikas. Mõned oravad oskavad lennata, teised ujuda, ühed elavad puu otsas, teised maa all, kolmandad tundras ja neljandad hoopis kõrvetavkuumas kõrbes. Film tutvustabki meile oravate mitmekesist maailma.(n)

programme.title: Osooni loomalood
programme.desc: Metskits on meie metsade üks ilusamaid ja graatsilisemaid loomi. Eesti aladel elutseb ta ligi kümme tuhat aastat. Metskitse on ilmselt looduses kohanud ka need inimesed, kes eriti sageli metsa ei satu. Autoaknast võib tihti näha metsaserval kitsekarja toitu otsimas. Autor-operaator Tarmo Mikussaar.(n)

programme.title: 4x4. Aafrika
programme.desc: 2017. aasta detsembri keskpaigas sättis 4x4-reiside tiim end taas teele. Sellel korral võeti eesmärgiks suur ja põnev Lääne-Aafrika, mida olid reisiseltskonnast eelnevalt väisanud vaid vähesed. Seekordsele kaheksat Lääne-Aafrika riiki väisavale sõidule starditi kolme autoga ja kümne inimesega. Peale 4500 km pikkust teekonda läbi Euroopa jõuti lõpuks välja Marokosse ja asuti suure kiiruga järgnevate riikide viisasid vormistama. Vahepealne aeg kulus aga Maroko pealinna Rabatiga tutvumiseks ja edasise pika reisi ettevalmistuseks. Lisaks 4x4-reiside seiklustele hoiame silma peal ka teisel pool Aafrikat Kilimanjaro mäe otsa ronivatel eestlastel ja nende tegemistel. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Järgmine ring
Druk
programme.desc: R: Thomas Vinterberg. Üks 2020. aasta tugevamaid filme, võõrkeelse filmi Oscari ja Euroopa filmiauhinnaga pärjatud musta komöödia sugemetega draama. Martin (Mads Mikkelsen), Tommy (Thomas Bo Larsen), Nikolaj (Magnus Millang) ja Peter (Lars Ranthe) on keskealised, argirutiinis kulgevad kooliõpetajad, kelle elust on kadunud kirg ning põnevus. Haarates kinni teooriast, et inimestele tuleks kasuks, kui nende veres oleks pidevalt väike annus alkoholi, alustavad sõbrad eksperimenti ja püüavad iga päev pidevat ning kerget joobeseisundit hoida.(n)

programme.title: Tee aadlidaamidega
Nothing Like a Dame
programme.desc: Neli armastatud inglise näitlejannat saavad vahetevahel maamajas kokku, selleks et lobiseda, meenutada ja naerda. Kõik neli alustasid karjääri 1950. aastatel ja on oma töö eest pälvinud aadlitiitli: Dame Eileen Atkins, Dame Judi Dench, Dame Joan Plowright ja Dame Maggie Smith. Seekord on kohale lubatud ka kaamerad. Roger Michelli dokumentaalfilmis räägivad nad oma elust ja tööst teatris, televisioonis ning filmis.(n)

programme.title: George Balanchine'i "Pähklipureja
George Balanchine's The Nutcracker
programme.desc: Balletitrupi New York City Ballet esituses aegumatu pühadeklassika. Pjotr Tšaikovski kirjutatud ja George Balanchine'i lavastatud "Pähklipureja" viib vaatajad imedemaale, abiks vaimustavad dekoratsioonid, uhked kostüümid ja hiiglaslik jõulupuu.(n)

programme.title: Eesel, heeringas ja nõialuud
programme.desc: Kolmest palast koosnev kogumik, kus esimese loo aluseks on india muinasjutt "Eesli mõttemõlgutus", mis jutustab eeslist, kes tahtis peremehe poolehoidu võita ja hakkas matkima peremehe lemmikut - koera. Teine pala on loodud eesti naljalaulu järgi ja räägib kuivamaa heeringast, kes mereelanikuks muutus. Kolmanda loo aluseks on tšehhi muinasjutt "Nõialuud" - näeme kahte poissi, kes nõialuua leiavad ja sellega toreda õhusõidu teevad. Ühe lame-, kahe ümarnukutehnikas loo stsenarist ja režissöör on Elbert Tuganov.(n)

programme.title: Ei-Ei
programme.desc: Ei-Eil on alati palju küsimusi. Magaiver ja teised üritavad neile kõigile vastata, aga igaühel on asjadele oma seletus ja nii tuleb küsimusi aina juurde ja juurde.(n)

programme.title: Hei, turbod
programme.desc: Täna viib turbode tee Keelatud linna Hiinas, kus neil tuleb taas rinda pista Vussi tempudega.(n)

programme.title: Pingviinipoeg Lolo seiklused
3.osa
programme.desc: Pingviinipoeg Lolo seiklused koos sõber Pepega kaunis ja ohtlikus Antarktikas - klassikaks saanud lugu sõprusest ja vaprusest. Seekord satuvad sõbrad röövpüüdjate kätte. Jaapani ja Sojuzmultfilmi meistrite koostöös 1987. aastal valminud multifilmi on Tallinnfilmile tõlkinud Valeeria Villandi, režissöör Arvo Kruusement, toimetaja Luule Žavoronok, näitlejad Ester Pajusoo, Mare Mander, Malle Pärn, Irja Aav, Jüri Krjukov, Hans Kaldoja, Rein Aren, Jaanus Orgulas, Tõnu Oja, Rein Oja, Enn Kraam jt.(n)

programme.title: Mörr
The Gruffalo
programme.desc: Lugu hiirekesest, kes läheb metsa jalutama ja pähklit otsima. Ta kohtub oma teel kolme vaenlase - rebase, öökulli ja maoga, kes kõik tahavad teda ära süüa, ning hiireke peab ellujäämise nimel kavaluse appi võtma. Ta räägib kõigile, et kohtus kohutava koletise ehk Mörriga, ja tema vaenlased jooksevad hirmunult oma teed. See annab hiirele enesekindlust - ta tunneb, et metsas pole enam midagi, mis teda kohutaks. Kuni ta kohtub oma fantaasia sünnitise, Mörriga. Armas joonisfilm on sündinud Julia Donaldsoni muinasjutu ja Axel Scheffleri joonistuste ainetel, mis kandideeris ka Oscarile ja BAFTAle.(n)

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Doktor Wangel soovitab Martinil öelda Deliale, mida ta tunneb. Isa abiga leiab Martin väga romantilise viisi kuidas seda teha.(n)

programme.title: Sipsik
programme.desc: Eesti lastekirjanduse üks armastatumaid kangelasi, kaltsunukk Sipsik, on saanud oma filmi, täis muusikat, seiklusi ja tõelisi tundeid. See on lugu väga erilisest ja üliarmsast elusast nukust ning õe ja venna armastusest, mis peab vastu ka kõige suurematele katsumustele. Eno Raua ja Edgar Valteri loodud vahva raamatutegelane, kellega tänaste laste emad-isad on suureks kasvanud, sümboliseerib lapsele omast siirust, uudishimu maailma vastu, vallatut meelt, kõikevõitvat sõprust ja universaalset armastust. Film on kirjeldustõlkega.(n)

programme.title: Talvelaulud Valgamaal
programme.desc: Hea, kui jälle lumi tuiskab, tervist, valge talv! Pehmeid helbeid maha puistab kõrge pilvesalv. Just nii ja mitut muud moodi laulavad lapsed talvisel Valgamaal. Laulud õpetas Lenel Rand, režissöör Elo Selirand, operaator Toorion Ojaperv, saate helirežissöör Kaspar Karner, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.(n)

programme.title: Kunksmoor ja kapten Trumm
programme.desc: Keset tuulist merd oli pisike saar, kus elas ainult Kunksmoor. Oma saarel keetis Kunksmoor punasest vasest katlas nõiarohtusid, millega ta oskas ravida igasuguseid haigusi ja tõbesid. Ühel päeval sattus saarele kapten Trumm... Nukufilm Aino Perviku lasteraamatu ainetel. Režissöör Heino Pars. Film on kirjeldustõlkega. Film on kirjeldustõlkega.(n)

programme.title: muusikavideod ETV2
programme.sub-title: Birgit Õigemeel. Et uus saaks alguse

programme.title: Gepardipere keskel
Cheetahs Growing Up Fast
programme.desc: Gepardid on ohtlikud kiskjad, kuid Kim Wolhuteril õnnestus võita ühe emagepardi usaldus, kes suhtus temasse kui oma pere liikmesse ja lubas tal pooleteise aasta jooksul filmida kutsikate kasvamist. Tulemusena sündis südamlik ja hingekriipiv dokumentaalfilm, mis heidab pilgu gepardite argiellu.(n)

programme.title: Petturid
Charade
programme.desc: Rež: Stanley Donen, os: Cary Grant, Audrey Hepburn. 1950. aastate üks olulisemaid Hollywoodi menufilmide lavastajaid Stanley Donen ("Lauldes vihmas", "Seitse pruuti seitsmele vennale") viib selles romantilises ja ootamatute süžeepööretega kelmikomöödias kokku kaks oma aja suurimat staari - Cary Granti ja Audrey Hepburni. Kaunis pariislanna Regina Lambert (Audrey Hepburn) leiab puhkusereisilt tagasi koju jõudes eest paljaksröövitud korteri. Naine saab teada, et tema abikaasa, kes elas topeltelu, põgenes teadmata suunas koos 250 000 dollariga ja on nüüd mõrvatud. Kuna raha surnukeha juurest ei leitud, hakkavad süütut naist ahistama kolm kurikaela, kes kõik olid kunagi tema mehega seotud. Olukorda tuleb päästma puhkusel kohatud hurmur Peter Joshua (Cary Grant), kellesse Regina ülepeakaela armub. Kuid kui šarmantne džentelmen hakkab pikapeale ise käituma kahtlaselt, peab naine otsustama, kas meest umbusaldada või anda ennast tema hoole alla. Etteaimamatu puändiga komöödias lööb kaasa tugev näitlejate ansambel, kus peaosalisi kehastanud Hepburni ja Granti kõrval teevad meeldejäävad rollisooritused tuntud koomikud Walter Matthau ning James Coburn. Hittfilmidega nagu „Puhkus Roomas“ (1953), "Ühe nunna elulugu" (1959) ja "Hommikueine Tiffany juures" (1960) kuulsaks saanud Audrey Hepburn (1929-1993) oli filmi valmimise aegu oma karjääri tippvormis. Juba 1930. aastatel koomikuna filmikarjääri alustanud ja hiljem mitmes Alfred Hitchcocki kriminullis („Loodest põhja poole“, „Kurikuulus“ jt) osalenud Cary Grantile (1904-1986) jäi „Petturid“ aga üheks viimaseks tööks, kus ta kaasa tegi. Filmist valmisid ka mitmed töötlused ja uusversioonid, viimane neist 2003. aastal hindikeelsena. Audrey Hepburn pälvis Regina rolli eest parima naisnäitleja BAFTA auhinna.(n)

programme.title: Georg Ots. Tavaline inimene
programme.desc: Georg Otsa 100. sünnijuubeliks valminud portreesaade jutustab loo sajandi häälest ja meie rahvuslikust valuutast. Georg Ots ei käitunud staarina Soomes ega ka Venemaal, ometi kõnelevad tema ande austajad lauljast kui mehest, kes on mõjutanud saatusi ja pööranud inimesi muusikausku. Saates meenutavad kuulsat baritoni kolleegid, kaasteelised ja pereliikmed, aga näeb ka haruldasi arhiivikaadreid, mida ETV ekraanil pole varem näidatud. Autorid Karmel Killandi ja Margit Kilumets, režissöör Maarika Lauri.(n)

programme.title: Kommentaare Eesti filmile
Kommentaar Eesti mängufilmile
programme.desc: Saates meenutavad filmitegemist osatäitjad Arved Haug ja Eino Baskin, teine režissöör Leida Laius, kommenteerib Ivalo Randalu. Režissöör Ly Pulk, toimetaja Jaak Lõhmus.(n)

programme.title: Juhuslik kohtumine
programme.desc: Muusikaline komöödia kohaliku filharmoonia korraldatud laulukonkursist, mis on vürtsitatud eksimuste ja eksituste virvarriga. Osades Georg Ots, Marina Jurassova, Arved Haug, Lia Laats, Eino Baskin, Alice Ader, Uno Loop jt. Režissöör Viktor Nevežin, stsenaristid Jüri Järvet ja Feliks Knorre, operaator Semjon Školnikov, kunstnikud Peeter Linzbach ja Linda Vernik, heliloojad Edgar Arro ja Uno Naissoo.(n)

programme.title: Tütarlaps tuletikkudega
Das Mädchen mit den Schwefelhölzern
programme.desc: H. C. Anderseni muinasjutu järgi valminud filmi peategelane on väike Inga, kelle vanemad on surnud. Tüdruk elab orbudekodus, mille juhataja on väga kuri ja ahne. Ta sunnib lapsi hommikust õhtuni tööle ja karistab karmilt iga üleastumise eest. Jõululaupäev on tema jaoks hea võimalus äri teha, kuna sel päeval on inimesed lahkemad ja annavad kergemini raha välja. Nii saadabki ta lapsed turule tuletikke müüma. Et äri paremini edeneks, paneb ta orvud omavahel võistlema - kes kõige rohkem müüb, saab preemia, kes aga kõige vähem, saab keretäie. Inga on küll nutikas, aga paraku ei taha keegi tema tikke osta.(n)

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Džungliässad aitavad ühel õnnetul ja eksinud opossumil mälu tagasi saada.(n)

programme.title: Kroonitud peakesed
programme.desc: Tsaaritarid lähevad võlukoolide-vahelisele võistlusele. Baba-Jagaal on täna sünnipäev ja ta on solvunud, et keegi teda ei õnnitle.(n)

programme.title: Ei-Ei
programme.desc: Suurhammas leiutab päikesevarju, mis töötab ka õhukonditsioneerina. Ei-Ei ja Magaiveri sahmimise tagajärjel lendab masin aga tiiki. Jäätunud tiiki jääb lõksu Putu, kes on nii pahane, et ähvardab minema kolida.(n)

programme.title: Lumemees
The Snowman
programme.desc: Väike poiss ehitab õue lumemehe, kes ärkab ellu. Koos asutakse seiklusele, mis viib nad Põhjanabale jõuluvana juurde. Raymond Briggsi lasteraamatul tugineva animafilmi lavastas Diane Jackson. Disney magusa stiili asemel kasutab ta elavamat ja lihtsamat laadi. Joonistused ja sellega harmoneeruv muusika on filmist teinud kõigi jõuluprogrammide pärli. Ilma dialoogita lastelugu on nauditavalt vanamoeline ja klassikaline.(n)

programme.title: Heelium
programme.desc: Doktor Wangel soovitab Martinil öelda Deliale, mida ta tunneb. Isa abiga leiab Martin väga romantilise viisi kuidas seda teha.(n)

programme.title: Tigu ja vaal
The Snail and the Whale
programme.desc: Suur vaal naeris mõtte üle, et väike tigu võib teda kuidagi aidata. Ometi pidi ta tõdema, et ka kõige suurem ei saa teinekord ise hakkama ja võib vajada kellegi pisikese ning aeglase abi.(n)

programme.title: Väike Mörr
The Gruffalo's Child
programme.desc: Ühel tormisel ja tuulisel õhtul läheb Mörri poeg isa hoiatustest hoolimata vapralt metsa Suurt Paha Hiirt otsima. Ta kohtub oma teel mao, öökulli ja rebasega, aga kuulsast hiirest pole kusagil kippu ega kõppu. Tekib küsimus, kas selline hiir on üldse kunagi olemas olnud?(n)

programme.title: Oravametsa lood
programme.desc: Alati valla on orava meeled, lõhnad on ninas ja maitsed on keelel.(n)

programme.title: Väike motoroller
programme.desc: Autost, mille koormaks on mänguasjad, kukub maha väike motoroller. Pärast mitmeid seiklusi leiab tubli motoroller tee lasteaeda, kus ta mudilastele palju rõõmu valmistab. Stsenarist Eno Raud, režissöör Heino Pars, helilooja Arvo Pärt.(n)

programme.title: Lahutus Läti moodi
programme.desc: Haralds võetakse tänu vanemate lahutusest tehtud videotele vastu filmikooli. See teeb vanematele rõõmu, kuid paraku peab Haralds neile ära rääkima, et nad on oma konfliktiga nüüd tuntuks saanud. Eva maailma päästmise reis jääb ära. Laura püüab maja müüa, kuid Aivars teeb kõik, et see ei õnnestuks. Tālis on nüüd oodatavast lapsest vaimustuses.(n)

programme.title: Üksindus ühenduses
The Great Disconnect
programme.desc: Nüüdisaega on kirjeldatud suure üksinduse ajastuna. Hoolimata edusammudest tehnoloogias, elutingimustes, hariduses ja tervishoius, on inimesed ühiskonnana lahku kasvanud ja see leiab väljenduse tervisekriisis, mis hõlmab kõiki vanuseid, sugusid, rasse ning kultuure. Terviseekspert Tamer Soliman uurib oma ala asjatundjatelt, mis on eraldatuse peamised põhjused ja mida saaks ette võtta.(n)

programme.title: 4x4. Aafrika
programme.desc: Sarja teises osas tutvume Maroko pealinna Rabatiga ja asume peale vajalike viisade vormistamist teele järgnevate vaatamisväärsuste poole. Teele jäävad Atlase mäestik, uhke kosk ning üks kohalikest filmistuudiotest, milles on lisaks paljudele India ja muude riikide filmidele vändatud nii mõnigi maailmakuulus linateos. Kodumaised mägimatkajad plaanivad samal ajal tõusta 4562 meetri kõrgusele Meru vulkaanile, millelt peaks avanema uhke vaade ees ootavale Aafrika kõigeimale tipule Kilimanjarole. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Ülejooksik
programme.desc: Venelaste kätte sattunud Walter ei jaksa vangivoorus vigastatud jalaga edasi liikuda. Sealt avastab ta juba Punaarmee mundrit kandev Wolfgang ja laseb sõbra laatsaretti toimetada. Pärast paranemist tuleb Walteril hakata eesliinil agitatsiooni tegema: valjuhääldiga veermahti sõdureid allaandmisele õhutama. Komandantuuris näeb ta ühel õhtul Wandat, kes lauldes sõdurite meelt lahutab. Nende katse koos põgeneda paraku luhtub. Pärast sõja lõppemist töötavad Walter ja Wolfgang Berliinis, Nõukogude piiripunktis, mis väljastab sõidulube läände. Ühel päeval saabub sinna Stehauf, kes tahaks sõita Kölni, kus ta poeg ehk veel elab. Wolfgang laseb nende kunagise mõnitaja arreteerida, Walterit aga meelitab ennast toetama lubadusega tema jaoks Wanda üles otsida. Taas tuleb Walteril poolt valida.(n)

programme.title: Arianne Phillips - kostüümid ja rollid
Arianne Phillips: Dressing the Part
programme.desc: Dokumentaalfilm räägib Oscarile nomineeritud kostüümikunstnikust ja kuulsuste stilistist Arianne Phillipsist, kes on üks mõjukamaid naisi moemaailmas. Filmis näeme-kuuleme eksklusiivintervjuusid Madonna, Lenny Kravitzi, Courtney Love'i ja Tom Fordiga. Jälgime Arianne tööd filmides ja Madonna staadionikontsertidel ning tema koostööd Gucci ja Pradaga.(n)

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: An elite hitman is successful working in the shadows. Now he's teaching his trade to an apprentice who is related to one of his previous victims.(n)

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: (Arthur Bishop), an assassin, decides to put his criminal past behind him and move forward. He gets drawn back to the crime world after his nemesis abducted his girlfriend - Bishop now must execute three assassinations around the world, and make them appear as accidents, to save his girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In the town of Derry, kids are disappearing one by one, leaving behind bloody traces. Eventually seven kids that are united by their hate to a clown that has affected them all, and the will to kill him, It meet again years later seeking revenge.(n)

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: With both her professional and personal life coming to a standstill, Emily decides to decompress by going on a vacation that she planned with her now former boyfriend. As she convinces her overprotective mother to accompany her, they soon find themselves in an adventure when they get kidnapped.(n)

programme.title: One for the Money
programme.desc: Stephanie Plum (Katherine Heigl) loses her job, and works with her cousin Finney as a bounty hunter . Her first case is to find officer Joe Morelli (Jason O'Mara), who's accused of murder but she faces obstacles because of his skills . During her search, she believes that he's innocent and tries to prove it.(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In a dystopian post-apocalyptic future in the nation of Panem, Katniss Everdeen (Lawrence) volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, where boys and girls between the ages of 12 and 18 are required to fight to death in a televised annual event until there is one remaining who will be crowned the victor.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: During the American Civil War, Lt. John Dunbar befriends an Indian tribe and meets a white woman who was raised by them. He sheds his old ways as he comes to believe in their cause.(n)

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: Five years after Superman left Earth to investigate if Krypton is still intact, he returns to a much-changed world where his former love, Lois Lane, has moved on, and the people of Earth have decided that they do not need Superman.(n)

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: As the last son of Krypton sent to Earth, a young journalist raised by his adoptive parents finds the fate of planet Earth in his hands after an attack. From the writer of "The Dark Knight," director of "300," and producer Christopher Nolan comes this epic Superman reboot.(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: The Avengers and their allies continue to protect the world from the threats that cannot be dealt with alone. Thanos, a new tyrant from the cosmic shadows, spreads wrongdoing between galaxies; and his goal is to collect the six infinite stones to reach an unlimited force.(n)

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
programme.desc: The story follows Clary Fray, a teenager who learns that she has inherited her mother’s power to slay demons. After her mother disappears, she joins other Shadow Hunters like herself. As she learns more of their secrets, she is forced to make difficult decisions that could cost her her life.(n)

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: The Losers
programme.desc: When an elite U.S. Special Forces unit are double-crossed by their boss while on a mission, they work together to exact vengeance on those who betrayed them.(n)

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: The Avengers and their allies continue to protect the world from the threats that cannot be dealt with alone. Thanos, a new tyrant from the cosmic shadows, spreads wrongdoing between galaxies; and his goal is to collect the six infinite stones to reach an unlimited force.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: After a period of breakup, The Mystery Inc. meet at Spooky Island to investigate strange happenings taking place there. They decide to team up again to solve the mystery.(n)

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing
programme.desc: After Don Pedro returns to Messina from a successful campaign against his rebellious brother Don John, his accompanying officers Claudio falls for the governor's daughter Hero, while Benedick argues with the governor's niece, Beatrice.(n)

programme.title: Automata
programme.desc: In a world ravaged by natural disasters and climate change, mankind faces one more threat in the form of robots violating their protocols against altering themselves, which could spell disaster for the survival of mankind as machines evolve beyond what they were meant for.(n)

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: Jupiter Jones finds her ordinary life turned upside down, when she discovers that she's an heiress of intergalactic nobility and together with an ex-military hunter must fight to save Earth from a destructive force.(n)

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Major William Cage finds himself thrown into a time loop-forcing him to fight aliens in the same brutal battle over and over, and together with Special Forces warrior Rita Vrataski they must find a way to defeat them.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
programme.desc: The crew of the Enterprise discovers a menacing terror from within their organization, prompting Captain Kirk to lead a manhunt into a war-zone world to capture one dangerous man.(n)

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In a world devastated by a global war, except for Western Europe (UFB) and Australia (the Colony), Douglas Quaid believes he is a factory worker until he discovers real memories of being a high-profile agent at UFB after visiting Rekall, a recreational company that implants false memories. A series of chases and clues reveal the plan to eliminate the Colony and only Quaid can "kill" the plan.(n)

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing
programme.desc: After Don Pedro returns to Messina from a successful campaign against his rebellious brother Don John, his accompanying officers Claudio falls for the governor's daughter Hero, while Benedick argues with the governor's niece, Beatrice.(n)

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: Former CIA operative Peter Devereaux (Pierce Brosnan) returns to work in order to take on a very personal mission. He soon finds himself in the midst of a fierce battle with a former pupil in a scenario involving senior officers in the agency and related to the Russian presidential election.(n)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A runaway train carrying toxic chemicals must be stopped before it derails and kills everyone in town. Its up to a train conductor and engineer (Denzel Washington and Chris Pine) to stop the train in time.(n)

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.(n)

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: Albert is a sheep farmer who lacks courage, he loses his beloved girlfriend when he withdraws from a duel. He soon meets another lady, and his bravery and confidence must be put to the test when the lady's spouse, an infamous criminal, demands payback.(n)

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: A grumpy Grinch leading a solitary life with his dog is annoyed when the neighboring city of Whoville decides to throw brighter, larger, and more cheerful celebrations. He hatches a scheme to ruin their festivities, but his nefarious plan collides with a cheerful plan of a cheerful young girl.(n)

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express
programme.desc: Hercule Poirot investigates the mysterious murder of a famous businessman on the Orient Express.(n)

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: As Buddy, brought up as an elf, comes to realize that he is a human being, not an elf, he embarks on a perilous journey to New York City in order to find his real father.(n)

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: Former CIA operative Peter Devereaux (Pierce Brosnan) returns to work in order to take on a very personal mission. He soon finds himself in the midst of a fierce battle with a former pupil in a scenario involving senior officers in the agency and related to the Russian presidential election.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Unstoppable

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Shredder and his evil Foot Clan have an iron grip on everything from the police to the politicians. The future is grim until four unlikely outcast brothers rise from the sewers and discover their destiny as Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles. The Turtles must work with fearless reporter April O'Neil and her wise-cracking cameraman Vernon Fenwick to save the city and unravel Shredder's diabolical plan.(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A mother is forced to move with her son, from the United States to live in China. He's embraced by a Kung Fu master who teaches him all the secrets of the game and changes his life, and the life of his mother for the better.(n)

programme.title: Power Rangers
programme.desc: A group of high-school kids with exceptional and unique superpowers, harness their abilities in order to save the world.(n)

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year of 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town and is found by Charlie, an 18 year old girl who is trying to find her place in the world. When Charlie revives him, she discovers that this is no ordinary, yellow VW bug.(n)

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, the multinational OmniCorp is at the center of robot and weapon technology. When Alex Murphy, a loving father and a good cop is seriously injured, OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer. But Alex's life begins to change and turns upside down.(n)

programme.desc: The 11-year-old Anna Fitzgerald enlists the help of a lawyer to earn medical release from her parents, who want her to donate her kidney to save the life of her elder sister Kate who has leukemia.(n)

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Auggie, a kid who was born with facial differences, goes to a mainstream elementary school for the first time. There, his family, community and classmates all struggle with their acceptance and compassion towards him. He unites them all with his fascinating journey where he shows that you can’t fit in if you were born to stand out. programme.desc: Cameron (Mark Ruffalo) is a depressed father who is addicted to alcohol, trying in various ways to regain his wife Maggie (Zoe Saldana) by taking full responsibility of his young daughters. In his attempt to deal with them, participate in their daily life, and do some chores, the girls do not make this task easy for the father.(n)

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Mason and Olivia are a divorced couple trying to raise their young son, Mason Jr. The film follows the boy's life for twelve years, from first grade at age 6, till the twelfth grade, examining his relationship with his parents all the way through.(n)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: During the time of the Roman empire, Emperor Marcus Aurelius decides that his heir will be General Maximus. However, his son, Commodus, murders him before he has a chance to act on his decision, and he becomes the Emperor after his father. Commodus then decides that Maximus must be killed, who in a turn of events, becomes a gladiator and a hero in people's eyes.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Robin Longstride along with his band of his mercenaries set out to unite the people of England to stand up to the invading French forces led by King Philip.(n)

programme.title: الفيلم الوثائقي Marvel's Behind The Mask
Automation
programme.desc: When AUTO, a workspace robot, finds out that another advanced model will be taking his place, his fear of destruction drives him to a devastating rampage as he tries to protect his existence, leaving the factory workers scrambling to find safety and put an end to the killing spree.(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: An evil dwarf penetrates the world between humans and mythical creatures, who declare war against the human race. A secret mission is planned to release the Golden Army, that is made up of a great number of strange and vicious creatures. Hellboy and his team are summoned to stop them and save humanity.(n)

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.(n)

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After T’Challa returns to his home in Wakanda to find himself king, he has to team up with CIA agent Everett K. Ross and members of the Wakandan special forces as “Black Panther” to prevent Wakanda from going into a war.(n)

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: After a case of high-level computer hacking arises, a man is released from prison to help American and Chinese authorities pursue a mysterious cyber criminal. The cat-and-mouse chase leads them from the U.S.A to Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: After twelve arduous labours and the loss of his family, Hercules found solace in bloody battle. Over the years he warmed to the company of six similar souls, as the King of Thrace hires them to train his men to become the greatest army of all time.(n)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A drone repairman (Tom Cruise) is sent back to an evacuated Earth where a human-alien war sixty years ago wiped out half the planet. He makes a shocking discovery that causes him to question everything he knows about his world, his mission and himself.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A trained gang performs a bank heist in an organized manner, and a federal agent is assigned to negotiate with them. Another agent is assigned to protect valuable assets inside a bank safe, leading to a series of negotiations from several ends.(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: Today, Kaulder is the last witch hunter remaining, and has spent centuries hunting down rogue witches, all the while yearning for his long-lost loved ones. However, unbeknownst to Kaulder, the Queen Witch is resurrected and seeks revenge on her killer causing an epic battle that will determine the survival of the human race.(n)

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: United Nations employee, Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt), must leave his family and traverse the world in a race against time to stop a Zombie pandemic that is crumbling armies and governments in its wake.(n)

programme.title: Colors
programme.desc: Two cops, one newly assigned and one is an old stager, are on the edge of losing control over their street authority in East Los Angeles when they get into an altercation due to the colors the gang members are wearing instead of presenting a unified front to the gang.(n)

programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: After twelve arduous labours and the loss of his family, Hercules found solace in bloody battle. Over the years he warmed to the company of six similar souls, as the King of Thrace hires them to train his men to become the greatest army of all time.(n)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A drone repairman (Tom Cruise) is sent back to an evacuated Earth where a human-alien war sixty years ago wiped out half the planet. He makes a shocking discovery that causes him to question everything he knows about his world, his mission and himself.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: Today, Kaulder is the last witch hunter remaining, and has spent centuries hunting down rogue witches, all the while yearning for his long-lost loved ones. However, unbeknownst to Kaulder, the Queen Witch is resurrected and seeks revenge on her killer causing an epic battle that will determine the survival of the human race.(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: When the lives of his wife and child are put in danger by a bloodthirsty sultan, prince Vlad risks his soul to save them.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Dangerous criminal Richard B. Riddick (Diesel) is being transported to prison in a cargo spacecraft. When the spaceship is damaged by comet debris and makes an emergency crash landing on an empty desert planet, Riddick escapes. However, when predatory alien creatures begin attacking the survivors, Riddick joins forces with the crew to develop a plan to escape the planet.(n)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.(n)

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: The beautiful Snow White gets into a fierce conflict with the Evil Queen. The Huntsman tries to train her to withstand these evil forces, but is it enough for her to defeat them.(n)

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Set in the late 21st century, the film centers on the crew of the spaceship Prometheus as it follows a star map discovered among the artifacts of several ancient Earth cultures. Seeking the origins of humanity, the crew arrives on a distant world and discovers a threat that could cause the extinction of the human race.(n)

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: This title is a science fiction action film that was directed by Nimrod Antal. The movie stars Adrian Brody and Laurence Fishburne among others and it is the third film in the “Predator” franchise. Royce (Adrian Brody) is a mercenary who regains consciousness to find himself parachuting into an unknown jungle. Once on the ground he links up with others who seem to have arrived there by the same means. Everyone in the group, with the notable exception of a doctor, seem to come from dark backgrounds. There is a drug cartel enforcer, a Sptsnaz soldier, a death row inmate and a Yakuza man to name only a few – not to mention Royce, who is himself a mercenary as mentioned earlier. As the film progresses, the group learn that they are in fact on an alien planet. That’s not the worst part though – they also learn that they are being hunted by an alien race known as the “Predators”.(n)

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Eva Lord (Eva Green) asks her ex-boyfriend Dwight (Josh Brolin) to help her escape her violent rich husband Damien Lord. But Dwight soon discovers that Eva's intention is full of evil and hatred. On the other hand, John Harrington (Bruce Willis) meets Nancy (Jessica Alba) and events escalate.(n)

programme.desc: The Autobots and Decepticons discover a space ship on the moon that contains secrets that can lead to war of the worlds. Events unfold as both sides attempt to capture the space ship.(n)

programme.title: Mission Impossible II
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt is on a mission to stop a deadly virus named "Chimera" from spreading. The virus causes deaths in a matter of hours, and Ethan has to get the vaccine before it is sold to a terrorist group in return for a large sum of money. Ethan meets Nyah, and develops feelings for her, at the same time that her life is put in danger.(n)

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: When Keller Dover's (Hugh Jackman) daughter and her boyfriend go missing, the police start searching for leads to find her, but when they fail due to lack of evidence, Dover takes matters into his own hands.(n)

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, private investigator Holland March (Ryan Gosling) is forced to work with another private eye Jackson Healey (Russell Crowe) to investigate the mysterious death of a porn star and a missing girl.(n)

programme.title: Get Him to the Greek
programme.desc: British rock star Aldous Snow lives in a whirlwind of alcohol and drugs. When Aaron interns at a record company, his manager assigns him to get Aldous from London to Los Angeles for a concert. When he reaches London and Aldous, he finds himself in chaos and unable to get him to the concert, while Aldous postpones their trip numerous times.(n)

programme.title: Life of Crime
programme.desc: The story is about Mickey (Jennifer Aniston), the wife of corrupt businessman Frank (Tim Robbins), who gets kidnapped by criminals who extorted her husband and demanded a ransom. Things go against the expected.(n)

programme.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: Dantes is falsely accused by his best friend Fernand and is imprisoned in an island prison for 13 years. Dantes escapes and transforms himself into a rich count and dreams of only one thing: revenge.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: The film revolves around the arrival of seven armed men, from the Old West to a remote village, in order to help its people, in their fight against an evil gang trying take advantage of the village and the people.(n)

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The three Musketeers team up with the lively D'Artagnan to defeat the forces of evil and stop the many attempts to seize the French throne.(n)

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: Napoleon Dynamite is a socially awkward teenager who lives with his grandma and unemployed older brother in Preston, Idaho. He sets out to help his friend, Pedro, win the class presidency while dealing with his insane family at home.(n)

programme.title: Tower Heist
programme.desc: A group of men who work at a tower discover that they are victims of a wealthy businessman, and that they are part of a plan to steal the tower.(n)

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: A barbershop in Chicago is a place where plenty of interesting situations happen between the customers and the hairdressers at the barbershop, where each have their own dreams that they strive to reach in many different ways.(n)

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: Ferris pretends to be sick so he doesn't go to school, and he persuades his girlfriend Sloane and his friend Cameron to go to Chicago to spend time there to help him heal. The triple go with the car of Cameron's father, and events take a comic turn.(n)

programme.title: The Flood
programme.desc: An immigration officer finds herself in a tight spot as the fate of an asylum seeker lies in her hand, while flashbacks of his journey out of his homeland are portrayed.(n)

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: The film follows the huge success painter Margaret Keane had in the 1950s, and her heated divorce from her husband Walter Keane, who fraudulently claimed credit for her works.(n)

programme.title: Zoolander 2
programme.desc: A competitive company starts trying to take Derek and Hansel out of business when they start modeling again.(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A Houston socialite urges her friend, Congressman Charlie Wilson, to help the Afghan people against Soviet invasion, prompting him to give up his playboy ways and recruit a rebel CIA as he tries to convince the US government to provide funds and help to Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: When their only son is killed in battle during WWII, the German couple Otto and Anna decide to resist the Nazi regime by writing postcards to urge people to protest against their government.(n)

programme.title: Six Days, Seven Nights
programme.desc: While taking a vacation with her boyfriend , Journalist Robin Monroe hires a plane driven by drunk pilot Quinn Harris to cover a story on an nearby island. The two don't get along at first, but when the plane crashes on a deserted island, Robin and Quinn have to face many dangers and adventures together.(n)

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of Steve Jobs: from college dropout to Apple founder, entrepreneur, and creator of one of the most widespread devices of the 21st century, the iPhone.(n)

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.(n)

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: The friendship and faith of a priest and a rabbi are tested when they both fall for an old friend. As both men struggle between upholding their duties and following their hearts.(n)

programme.title: Henry's Crime
programme.desc: An innocent highway tollbooth worker is convicted of a bank heist, and decides to take the fall for a crime he did not do. While in jail, his formerly pathless life is altered when he meets his cellmate Max, a con man with whom he plans to rob a bank upon his release.(n)

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Ryan Bingham is a man with a very odd job. He travels to offices across the United States in order to execute layoffs. His job has him travelling most of the time and he has found a comfortable life for himself. However, Natalie Keener, a rapidly-rising young co-worker at Ryan’s head office, threatens to throw his world off balance by proposing that firing should be done through the internet.(n)

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: In 1964, racism continues to cast a shadow over America. Three civil rights defenders disappear in Mississippi. Two FBI agents go to the town to look into this mysterious case. Robert Anderson, worked in the region before joining the FBI, is well aware of the nature of the place, so he does not mind bending rules to achieve his goal. Events escalate and attacks on black citizens begin.(n)

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: When World War II ends, soldier Freddie goes home, looking for a new start. Somehow, things get rocky when he comes across a cult that is looking for new members.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Rubin Carter is a middleweight boxer who managed to escape the tragedies and sufferings of his childhood. He is hopeful about the future, but his hopes are thwarted when he is accused of murder and imprisoned.(n)

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A boxer travels with his brother, who is managing him, for a final boxing match. But when an unexpected travel companion joins them, truths and cracks in the two brothers' relationship come to the surface.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.(n)

programme.title: Sitting in Limbo
programme.desc: After he is wretched living in the UK for 50 years, the Jamaican-born man, Anthony Bryan, struggles during the Windrush scandal to be accepted as a British Citizen, as well as falling victim to the UK Home Office, at which he is considered an illegal immigrant and is threatened of deportation.(n)

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: An ice driver leads a high-stakes rescue mission to save trapped miners after a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada.(n)

programme.title: Love Locks
programme.desc: In the City of Light, Lindsey fell in love with Jack while studying at the Sorbonne, a romance that quickly ended when she went back to the US. Twenty years later, Lindsey returns to Paris with her daughter, only to run into Jack who quickly catches feelings for her all over again.(n)

programme.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
programme.desc: When a fire breaks out in the prison for the mentally ill, Dr. Albert Beck runs away and takes a shelter in an abandoned house, after which he's surprised to find that his hideout is the new house of a woman and her 18-year-old daughter.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.(n)

programme.title: Jane Fonda in Five Acts
programme.desc: A documentary about the American actress, activist, environmentalist, fashion model and fitness coach Jane Fonda, through diving deep into her personal life, her relationship with her father Henry Fonda and the great efforts she made to become who she is.(n)

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.(n)

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.(n)

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: In this sequel, John Wick has killed a member of the High Table, a shadowy international assassin's guild, deeming him an excommunicado (excluded member) and raising a US$ 14 million price tag for his head. A whole world of ruthless hit men and women are pursuing him around every corner.(n)

programme.title: Embattled
programme.desc: A young man seeks to become an MMA fighter like his estranged father, all the while struggling not to get carried away with violence like him.(n)

programme.title: Mare of Easttown
programme.desc: As detective Mare Sheehan from Easttown, Pennsylvania takes charge of the investigation of the murder of a teenage mother, she has to grapple with her own personal failures, while trying to protect her loved ones.(n)

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: Over the span of a week, the shocking revelations and exploits of the guests and employees at the White Lotus resort in Maui, Hawaii turn a supposedly relaxing vacation into a rather harrowing experience.(n)
